scripts.db-apply: cd "src/app/db/prisma" && npx prisma2 lift up -c --auto-approve || true
scripts.db-studio: export POSTGRES_URL='postgresql://'$(kubectl exec $(kubectl get pod -l 'app=timecampus-channel-whatsapp' -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') -- printenv POSTGRES_USER)':'$(kubectl exec $(kubectl get pod -l 'app=timecampus-channel-whatsapp' -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') -- printenv POSTGRES_PASSWORD)'@localhost:5012/'$(kubectl exec $(kubectl get pod -l 'app=timecampus-channel-whatsapp' -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') -- printenv POSTGRES_DB) && cd "src/app/db/prisma" && npx prisma2 studio --port=5013
scripts.db-all: npm run db-migrate && npm run db-apply && npm run db-generate
scripts.start: npm run db-generate && npm run db-apply && node ./dist/server.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run db-apply && npm run format && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --config ./nodemon.json ./dist/server.js
